name: Blobinator V0.2
description:
This is a very early version of an RPG I'm making called Blobinator. In this game, you simply kill evil blobs that you encounter randomly.  Along the way you gain better weapons and armor, leveling up to advance. This game will of course be updated extensively over time. There will be a lot more added and improved.

--CONTROLS--

Arrowkeys/Mouse Click - Movement, Menu Navigation

Enter - Select

Esc - Menu

-------------------

V0.2 includes:

-4 new enemies

-A new area

-7 new items

-A new battle background
